page.title: 10Crops/Field and Street names
page.content: STRAWBERRIES: Some years ago these were grown for sale in the shops and for the jam factory in Brigg.Now they are sold straight from the fields . ITALIAN RYEGRASS: It is sown in early autumn,grazed by sheep in spring and harvested by combine harvester two years in sucession.Grown under contract for a seed merchant. Linseed new crop see page 12. FIELD NAMES. A sample of these are : Pudding Poke,Edmund Wright,The Sykes, Sally Ellerby,Stone Marfurrow,Wells close,Hackett Moor,Beaver's close.p.12 STREET NAMES KIRMINGTON About 3 years ago the council asked us all where we lived.As a result street signs arrived.But people still use their own names.Old,Butt hill,Line hills,Gipsy hill,pit St.Main St.Path. New;Croxton Rd.East end lane,no name, Gravel pit lane,no name,Orchard lane.
